name: Brave Wizard
description:
This game has been made in 48hrs for the Kenney Game Jam!

In this game you are a wizard that is sent to kill all enemies in the area. Yet you are not brave enough to kill all the enemies. Grow you courage by killing enemies of your level so you can defeat them all!. 

The theme of this GameJam was  "Growth". I implemented this theme with the growth of the courage of the wizard. 

WASD - Move

Left click - Shoot
